summary: Test suite for the Prefect commandâ€‘line interface's profile management features, verifying creation, deletion, inspection, listing, renaming, and activation of profiles, as well as the resulting behavior of Orion service connections under various authorization and health conditions.
business_intent: Guarantee that users can reliably manage Prefect configuration profiles via the CLI and that profile changes correctly influence connectivity to Orion services, supporting both cloud and hosted deployments with proper handling of authentication and service health.
